mapper.select: SELECT * FROM address a JOIN member m ON a.member_id = m.member_id WHERE m.member_id = #{memberId}
SELECT * FROM cart c JOIN product p ON c.product_id = p.product_id JOIN image i ON p.product_id = i.product_id WHERE c.product_id = #{productId} AND c.member_id = #{memberId} AND i.main = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `order` ( member_id, name, addr, addr_detail, phone, zipcode, req, price, payment_method ) VALUES ( #{memberId}, #{name}, #{addr}, #{addrDetail}, #{phone}, #{zipcode}, #{req}, #{price}, #{paymentMethod} )

INSERT INTO orderdetail ( order_id, product_id, price, cnt ) VALUES ( #{orderId}, #{productId}, #{price}, #{cnt} );
DELETE FROM cart WHERE product_id = #{productId} AND member_id = #{memberId};
mapper.select: SELECT o.order_id, date_format(o.rdate,'%Y-%m-%d') as rdate, od.price, od.cnt, od.product_id, p.name, i.img FROM `order` o JOIN orderdetail od ON o.order_id = od.order_id JOIN product p ON od.product_id = p.product_id JOIN image i ON p.product_id = i.product_id WHERE o.member_id = #{memberId} AND i.main = 'Y';
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO address ( member_id, name, zipcode, addr, addr_detail, phone, addr_name ) VALUES ( #{memberId}, #{name}, #{zipcode}, #{addr}, #{addrDetail}, #{phone}, #{addrName} )
